Member Function Documentation

- (void EC2DescribeSnapshotsRequest.)addFilter: (EC2Filter *)  filter  

Adds a single object to filters.

This function will alloc and init filters if not already done.

Property Documentation

- (NSMutableArray *) filters [read, write, retain]

A list of filters used to match properties for Snapshots.

For a complete reference to the available filter keys for this operation, see the <a "http://docs.amazonwebservices.com/AWSEC2/latest/APIReference/">Amazon EC2 API reference.
